## Data exploration in R

```{r}
# Add libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)

```

```{r}
# View the dataset
# View(diamonds)

# Explore/describe data
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)
```

```{r}
# pairs plot
ggpairs(data = diamonds)

# Scatterplot
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
  geom_point()

# histogram
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) +
  geom_histogram()

# boxplot
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = clarity, y = price)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(color = cut))
```
